abilities.title: Roger, Roger
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, each allied Battle Droid Supporting character within 4 of a character in this Unit may . Tactical Network Choose another allied Battle Droid character within 4. The chosen character may , then may gain , remove one condition from itself, or make a 5 dice attack. Target, concentrate all firepower When an allied Battle Droid character makes an attack, if the targeted character is within 4 of one or more other allied Battle Droid characters, the attacking character adds 1 die to its attack roll. Complete analysis When you spend to place this Unit's Order Card in reserve, spend 1 less .
